definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
to die/to depart this mortal coil
to depart this life/to be no more
to pass in an instant/over in the twinkling of an eye

sentences.english: Mother loves me best.’She suddenly smiled, a quick, beautiful smile.
sentences.chinese: 她突然笑了一下，一个转瞬即近逝美丽的微笑。

sentences.english: The childhood dreams, which I assumed had gone with the wind, reappeared in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 本以为早已随风飘逝的年少时的梦境再次浮现。

sentences.english: Passed as death, On Semi-live for.
sentences.chinese: 不如溘然逝，安用半活为。

sentences.english: Death now my master; cold as stone upon the field; I fall like blossom.
sentences.chinese: 司命今已至，冷若旷野一顽石，魂如落花逝。

sentences.english: While barred clouds bloom the soft-dying day.
sentences.chinese: 当片片浮云把缓缓将逝的一天照映。

sentences.english: Touch the face of small guy, burning Jin eye bottom dark light one Shan but die.
sentences.chinese: 摸着小家伙的脸蛋，炎烬眼底暗光一闪而逝。

sentences.english: When shadow comes to claim our souls, some must rise-the light of old.
sentences.chinese: 灵魂随影而逝，升于高处化为古老的圣光。

sentences.english: Nothing lost and nothing gained, everything will flow.
sentences.chinese: 岂知得失皆两空，一切终将随风逝。

sentences.english: It's the only sound now love's gone.
sentences.chinese: 当爱已逝，它是唯一的声响。

sentences.english: All the past is the wind.
sentences.chinese: 过去的所有都会随风飘逝。

sentences.english: A cold, low whistle; accompanies my last breath; wind in sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 寥落乎馀响，尚存一息随之逝，悲风共凄凉。

sentences.english: You are the falling year that autumn brings ;

definition: to fade into the distance/(fig.) to peter out/to fade away
to sigh in regret or pity/Taiwan pr. [wan4]
deep and somber/see also 窈窈[yao3 yao3]
(of an expanse of water) vast/distant and indistinct/tiny or insignificant
